definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It seems a bit idealist for me to think of money and private properties.
sentences.chinese: 我如此这般看待金钱和私有财产，似乎有些理想主义。

sentences.english: This is what I call “Realistic idealism”.
sentences.chinese: 我称之为“现实的理想主义”。
理想主义，并有牺牲精神。

sentences.english: Is it just an idealistic, delusional view of the future?
sentences.chinese: 还是说这只是一个对未来的理想主义的幻觉？

sentences.english: An idealistic American couple—young, in love.
sentences.chinese: 这是一对理想主义的美国年轻人。

sentences.english: Idealism and good intentions are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 理想主义和善意是不够的。

sentences.english: Zhang Chengzhi always spreads moral idealism in his novels.
sentences.chinese: 张承志始终高扬着道德理想主义的大旗。

sentences.english: That was the idealistic part of the speech, and it was effective.
sentences.chinese: 以上是演说的理想主义部分，是起到作用的。

sentences.english: Many people admire idealism, but it usually leads to disappointment or trouble.
sentences.chinese: 许多人崇尚理想主义，但它往往带来失望或烦恼。

sentences.english: She blasted away at his false idealism.
sentences.chinese: 她猛烈抨击他的虚伪的理想主义。

sentences.english: The conversions from realism to idealism are not wholly convincing.
sentences.chinese: 从现实主义回到理想主义的转换并不完全令人信服。

sentences.english: Idealism,good intention,a lot of money wasn't practical.
sentences.chinese: 理想主义，良好意愿，钱财，都是不切实际的。

sentences.english: But I think, more than that, it's a matter of idealism.
sentences.chinese: 但我认为，更多的问题是一种理想主义的存在。

sentences.english: We see that we are still a very idealistic company.
sentences.chinese: 我们明白，我们仍然是一家具有理想主义的公司。

sentences.english: As much as idealism there really is a pragmatism to Earthships.
sentences.chinese: “关于“地球”的实用主义和理想主义一样多。

sentences.english: The INFJ strives for the ideal in every aspect of their life.
sentences.chinese: INFJ在他们生命的各个方面都追求理想主义。
